Today in Caithness, it's a quiet start with 2 ft @6s SSW lines and fresh 26 mph SSW winds, making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions improve slightly with 5 ft @10s WNW swell and moderate 14 mph SW winds, offering some workable options at spots like Point of Ness and Murkle Point. The day after, expect 4 ft @10s WNW with similar winds, still providing fun waves at the same spots. Best: tomorrow.
